name: 行銷數據分析
description: This is a fundamental course in marketing analytics aiming at helping the MOT major students become familiar with theories and practices of marketing analytics theories. Major emphasis will be placed on introduction and case studies. The students are expected to analytic skills in market segmentation, targeting, positioning, product management, brand management, pricing management, market research, and marketing planning through lectures and case studies.
goals: 學會問題解決的基本演算法

methodologies.note: 透過課程介紹行銷資料分析方法與工具
